purpose: This code snippet is part of the AWS SDK for JavaScript v3 (aws-sdk-js-v3). It provides functionalities related to authentication, endpoint resolution, user agent handling, retry strategies, and configuration loading for AWS services. It includes middleware for adding AWS authentication headers, resolving service endpoints based on region and other configurations, and managing user agent strings. Additionally, it implements adaptive and standard retry strategies with token bucket rate limiting to handle transient and throttling errors.
